CatDescriptText: Mr. James S. Jones, Susquehanna Street, was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Up" column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 24, 1958, pg. A1 with question: "Do you approve of women bartenders?" answer reads: "I don't disapprove, because the job is considered gainful employment and women have just as much right to the job as men."
TitMainTitle: James S. Jones facing Pittsburgh Courier reporter George Barbour, in front of Jenkins Arcade, Liberty Avenue, Downtown
